title: My inspections
description: View and track the status of your inspections.

empty.title: No inspections ordered
empty.description: Your ordered vehicle inspections will be displayed here. You can order an inspection in the vehicle detail view.

request.dialogDescription: Our professional technician will inspect the vehicle and prepare a detailed report.
request.loginRequiredDesc: You must be logged in to order an inspection.
request.toastSentDesc: Our technician will contact you shortly.
request.toastErrorDesc: An error occurred while sending the request.
request.successDesc: We have received your request to inspect {title}. We will contact you within 24 hours.
request.successOrderedDesc: We will contact you shortly to arrange a suitable time.
